name: Zero-G
description: Zero-G is a futuristic sports game in zero gravity inspired by Speed Ball and Enders Game. Set out on a 1-3 player cooperative campaign to become the champions of the solar system, or engage in 2-6 player competitive matches.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5770 /w 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Best played with a controller
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB NVIDIA 970 / AMD Radeon 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Best played with a controller
